mess.house: You are in the living room in your family house in Khayda. It is a clear day, no bad weather in sight.
mess.village: You find yourself near the chief's hut in the village of Khayda. There is also a market and an alchemist's hut nearby.
mess.lake: You walk along a clear lake. Now it is ... clear to you why it is called that way.
mess.forest: You find yourself in a nearby forest. The sheer size of the trees and thick shrubbery make it hard for you to distinguish anything distant.
mess.fields: You wonder through the wheat fields near Khayda. There are several huts and farmers are harvesting crops here.
mess.mine: You are in an abandoned mine. You can see old equipment left behind, as if miners left in haste. You wonder what has happened to the people working here.
mess.market:
You stand if front of the best-looking merchant in the market. 'How can I be of service?' He asks.
Enter 1 to trade [trade]
Enter 2 to return to the village
mess.alchemist:
You slowly open the hut's door and immediately a strong smell of boiling liquid wolfsbane hits you. In front of you stands a mysteriously looking woman.
Enter 1 to talk to her [talk]
Enter 2 to return to the village
mess.alchemtalk:
'Hmm... I don't remember your face. What do you want?' she asks.
Enter 1 to ask her about local legends
Enter 2 to return to the village
mess.alchemtalk2:
'Ah yes, the legend. We had to explain all the misfortune that has been happening around here. We call him Zandalar. He's voidborn and he's been terrorizing
our village since I was a little girl. The wheatworm infestation of our fields, for example, is his doing.
All who tried to stop him failed as they didn't have the item needed.'
Enter 1 to ask what is she talking about
Enter 2 to return to the village
mess.alchemtalk3:
'You stand no chance against him, unless you wield Zandalar's staff. It is said that his brother Alberimus stole the Staff when he discovered Zandalar's plans
to rule the world. Alberimus was then imprisoned by his own brother and the location of the Staff remains a mystery.'
Enter 1 to ask what happened next
mess.alchemtalk4:
Before Alberimus got imprisoned, he left behind a shard. That shard should teleport anyone - and anything - to Alberimus. In some wierd turn of events
I managed to obtain said Shard. I will give it to you, but you have bring me 4 wolf pelts and worm fangs, 6 snake tongues and 8 spider webs.
You have no idea how hard to get these items are nowadays and I need them so I can help local folk.'
Enter 1 to ask her to repeat what she just said because you got distracted by a fly
Enter 2 to assure her you will bring her the items and return to the village
mess.alchemist2:
'So, have you brought the items I need? Guess we're about to see...'
Enter 1 to ask the alchemist about the local legend
Enter 2 to offer her obtained loot
Enter 3 to return to the village
mess.alchemist3:
'Thank you for the ingredients I needed. Have you used the Shard yet by any chance?
You can do so by entering 'use' outside of combat or while not talking nor trading.'
Enter 1 to return to the village
mess.chief:
As soon as you open the majestic doors that lead into the chief's hut, you are greeted by the chief's friendly voice:'Hello fellow townsman.
You seem like a foreigner, strange... we haven't had one since... the accident...'
Enter 1 to let him continue speaking [talk]
Enter 2 to return to the village
mess.talkchief:
'I suppose I could tell you something useful.' he continues. 'If you venture outside the village - I would not advise you to - you will face danger,
the forest is full of wolves, the fields are being ravaged by the wheatworms, our lake is inhabited by venomous snakes and nearby mine is crawling with spiders.'
Enter 1 to let him continue speaking
Enter 2 to return to the village
mess.talkchief2:
'If you didn't know, in this land we don't fight physically. Instead, we play a game known as 'Nim': the players take turns in removing 1 - 3 stones from
one pile of 21 stones. The player, who first gets the amount of stones to 0, wins. If you win, your opponent's soul should offer you some goods.
However if you lose, you will only get hurt. To read this again, while not in combat, not trading nor talking, just enter 'combat'.
Enter 1 to ask about local legends
Enter 2 to ask the chief to repeat what he just said because you weren't paying attention
Enter 3 to return to the village
mess.talkchief3:
'Ah yes, local legends, of course, I knew you would be interested. There is said to be an ancient tool of immense power,
it is also said to be able to add one stone mid-fight, not replacing the player's turn, meaning that with enough skill and this item,
one cannot possibly loose a fight. Our alchemist might know more.'
Enter 1 to ask the chief to repeat what he just said because you fell asleep
Enter 2 to return to the village
mess.prison:
As your eyes adjust to the dim light, you begin to see several cells, containing mostly horrifiyng skeletons.
There are stairs going up, but before you are able to move, a faint voice calls to you.
mess.park:
Shiver runs down your spine as you walk through the worst park you have ever been to.
Trees twisted as if tormented, grass dry and of violet color, nothing here resembles happiness.
mess.theater:
You see an old amphitheater down the street, it's walls and stairs all crumbling under the pressure of time.
'This one's not for playing.' you whisper to yourself.
mess.center: The center of this so-called city is as old as humanity itself and the ancient buildings serving unknown purposes somehow make you feel uncomfortable.
